item.name: Agency Customers

Customers List
This api return the collection of all Agency Customers.

Customer Details
This api show the details of requested Customer.

Create Customer
This api is for create new Customer

Customer Update
This api update the details of requested Customer.
Delete Customer

Toggle Customer Status
This api update the customers status to active or deactive
Agency Domain Launch

Agency Domain Launch Api
This api to verify the domain before jump to agency portal.
Agency Invoices

Show Invoice
This api show the invoice details.

item.name: Agency Permissions Api

Permission List
This api return the collection of all Permissions created.
Agency Roles Management

Roles List
This api return the collection of all Roles created.

Role Details
This api show the details of requested Role.

Create Role
This api is for create new Role

Role Update
This api update the details of requested Role.
Delete Role
Agency Services

Get Services
This api return services collection.

Show Service Details
This api show the service details.

Create Service
This api create new service.

Update Service
This api update service.
Delete Service

Toggle Service Status
This api update the service status.

Toggle Service Catalog Status
This api update the service catalog status to active or pending.
Agency Services Catalog

Get Services
This api return services collection.

Show Service Details
This api show the service details.
Agency Services Requests
Get Requested Services List
Get Request Service details by Id
Request Service
Request Service Change Status
Agency Users Management

Get Users
This will return logged in user profile.

Show User Details
This api show the uer details.

Create Users
This api create new user.
Update User Details.
Delete User

Toggle User Status
This api update the users status to active or deactive
other then customers.
Change Password of Any User
Authentication

Access Token Or Login
This function is useful for login, to return access token for users.

Change Password
change password request of user

Logout
Hit api and session get out
Authentication and Agency Profile Settings

Register Agency
This api is useful for register new Agency and return access token with agency and user information

Access Token Or Login
This function is useful for login, to return access token for agencies.

Verify Agency
This function is used to verify a new agency

Forgot Password
This api will send an email to valid user with token for resetting his/her password

Create New Password
authenticate user request and then create new password

Logout
Hit api and session get out

Generate Verification Token
This function generate new verification token of user

Change Password
change password request of user

Profile
Get Profile Info
Update Profile
